deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

renounceOwnership(uint256).details: Renounce the ownership. This will leave the contract without any owner. Only owner can call this function

params._validationCode: A code to prevent aaccidental calling of this function

updateOwner(address).details: Transfer the ownership to some other address. new owner can not be a zero address. Only owner can call this function

params._newOwner: Address to which ownership is being transferred
